bool MyApp::OnInit (  )  [virtual]

'Main program' equivalent: the program execution "starts" here

this one is called on application startup and is a good place for the app initialization (doing it here and not in the ctor allows to have an error return: if OnInit() returns false, the application terminates)

Definition at line 49 of file xfardic.cpp.
